comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: Here's how Kerry's pic appeared in the Australian Town & Country Journal in July 1900 (the pic in the middle) - nla.gov.au/nla.news-page5334444 ; I'm amazed at how many of these pics can be ferreted out of the digitised newspapers...in this instance I just keyed in 'Victoria' and checked the box to display images only...it's kind of like cheating!...it's such a pity that the Sydney Mail over on Google News Archive is now effectively unsearchable...I lost my painstakingly compiled index of the Sydney Mail in the flood last year and I can't summon the will to compile another one.
